affiliations.name: Institute for Globally Distributed Open Research and Education

description: scribl is a system for the semantic capture of relationships in biological literature. scribl statements are added as tags to articles in a literature database ( currently Zotero. These tags are parsed and used to create a graph data structure that can be then be exported for use in a graph database platform such as Neo4j, or Python's NetworkX

additional_descriptions.description:
Development is on GitHub: https://github.com/amberbiology/scribl

Binary packages are available on PyPI: https://pypi.org/project/scribl/.

title: scribl: A system for the semantic capture of relationships in biological literature
